children.name: Text
children.value:
On a planet, far, far, away...
lived a magical space cat named BUB.

children.name: Text
children.value:
One fated night,
during her evening stroll...

children.name: Text
children.value:
She heard a rustling coming from
inside a womblewhomp tree.

children.name: Text
children.value:
As she approached, she was spooked
by a tiny fanged critter!

children.name: Text
children.value:
"I'll name you Spooky!" she exclaimed,
and brought the little fella to her
cozy home to rest.

children.name: Text
children.value:
All tucked in, they dozed off
into a deep slumber...

children.name: Text
children.value:
Suddenly BUB awoke as a gust of
wind threw the windows open,
only to find Spooky missing!

children.name: Text
children.value:
BUB rushed to her space pod,
on a mission to find and save Spooky.

children.name: Text
children.value:
After BUB defeated the monster Pupilera,
the explosion destroyed her pod & it crashed
down on Earth… but she safely ejected out!

children.name: Text
children.value:
BUB safely landed, but her space
pod was nowhere to be found.
And so her journey begins...

children.name: Text
children.value:
BUB got her battery and the pod,
but the raccoon babies carried away
the seven remaining Critical Pod Pieces!

children.name: Text
children.value:
BUB must find and retrieve the
seven stolen Critical Pod Pieces to
leave Earth and find Spooky.

children.name: Text
children.value:
The pieces could be anywhere on Earth
by now! Help BUB rebuild her space pod and
find Spooky by supporting her Kickstarter!
(and get exclusive BUB STUFF & Game Features)

events.comment: The head must be hidden/shown *before* any change to the animation of the player (because player animation will be changed after the events, so we can’t set the position of the head at the proper position.)
TODO: this tweak gravity and could be replaced by updating the jump speed instead.
Destroy enemies which are too far
Destroy items which are too far
Tapes are triggers too. If the player collide with a tape, the trigger has already been activated (see Common/Triggers) so it’s safe to delete the tape now

parameters: "I have a bad feeling about this."
"Let's charge up the Power Blast just in case."
"Press the yogurt firing button to fire!"
"If you hold the eyeball button long enough, my antenna starts flashing."
"If you hold F long enough, my antenna starts flashing."
"This indicates that you’ve charged up a Power Blast!"
"To fire the Power Blast, press the Blast button."
"To fire the Power Blast, press Enter."
"Try it out on this giant meteor!"
"Let’s grab this stuff with the Grappling Arm."
"Press the Arm button to grab items and add them to our inventory"
"Press G to grab items and add them to our inventory"
"Good! Now hold the laser to charge the laser."
"The longer you hold it, the more powerful it becomes."
"Let go to release the power shot."
"I'm going to need your help to work this thing."
"Use my PAW PAD to control my ship."
"Use arrow keys to control my ship."
"Use the laser button to shoot obstacles and enemies."

A Vulnerable object can be hit by PlayerBullet (if Invulnerable variable is equal to 0).
It has a Life variable (decreased according to PlayerBullet.Variable(DamagePower)) and a Killed variable.
